content.rendered:
Directed by Vikas Bahl.

Written by Chaitally Parmar. Anvita Dutt.

Cast Shahid Kapoor(Jagjinder Joginder). Alia Bhatt(Alia Arora). Pankaj Kapur(Bipin Arora). Sanjay Kapoor(Harry Fundwani). Sushma Seth(Mummiji). Niki Walia(Geetu Arora). Sanah Kapoor(Eesha Arora (as Sanah Kapur)). Vikas Verma(Robin Fundwani (as Vikas Verman)). Karan Johar(Special Guest). Kumud Pant(Business Wedding Guest). Atul Sharma(Business Wedding Guest) . Manoj Anand(Eesha Wedding Guest). Angela(Opera Singer). Luis Mi Arranz(JJ Stunt Double). Darshan Bains(Grandson). Jayraj Bains(Grand Dad). Mohinder Bains(Grand Mother). Emily Beaumont(Waitresses). Shalini Chandran(Meetu). Bradley Dalloway(Hotel Staff 5). Callum Dalloway(Hotel Staff 6). Terry Dalloway(Inspector James).Shibani Dandekar. Taru Devani(Sindhi Woman). Rob Dobson(Stud Boy 2). Lucky Farid(Sunny Arora). Donna Flitcroft(Policemen 3). Mez Galaria(Dancer).

Language Hindi.

Producers Vivek b Agrawal. Tanvi Gandhi. Karl Hall. Karan Johar. Anurag Kashyap. Madhu Mantena Varma. Apoorva Mehta. Vikramaditya Motwane. Ranjan Singh. Krzysztof Solek. Maciej Zemojcin.

Production Film Poland Productions. Fox STAR Studios.
